body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1.have wooded foothills in play
2.sacrifice it to fetch a mountain or forest 3. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? It searches for mountain or plain instead  as if it were arid mesa What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? version 1.42 on a mac pro using OSX mountain lion If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). Please provide any additional information below.
author: [Dwayne...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/117779160227519969928/)
title: Wooded Foothills card is miscoded

comments.body:
Thanks for reporting this. Fixed for next release.

**Status:** Accepted
comments.author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)

comments.body:
This issue was closed by revision 9c885a4f404e .

**Status:** Fixed

content:
_From [Dwayne...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/117779160227519969928/) on October 11, 2013 05:14:54_

What steps will reproduce the problem? 1.have wooded foothills in play
2.sacrifice it to fetch a mountain or forest 3. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? It searches for mountain or plain instead  as if it were arid mesa What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? version 1.42 on a mac pro using OSX mountain lion If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). Please provide any additional information below.
